title: Overlay flickers in Castle Story
body:
The overlay flickers and is not visible most of the time in Castle Story, which is in Alpha, on my Win7x64 system.

In the main menu it still displays fine.
Once loaded into the game, it disappears, but regularly flashes in for a minimal time.


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1047/ .*
